event.title: was founded and established by Alaga, Baba Dala many centuries ago

data.event: Ilala kingdom was founded and established by Alaga, Baba Dala many centuries ago with an estimated land area of 35 square kilometers.

event.title: came from Ile-Aga Family in Ile-Ife.(Ref: National Archive, Kaduna NAC/194 dated 30/09/1953

data.event: Hence, Alaga is the ancestor of the present Ala.He(Alaga) came from Ile-Aga Family in Ile-Ife.(Ref: National Archive, Kaduna NAC/194 dated 30/09/1953).
